greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(sigma(n), sigma(2n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function, and sigma is the sum of divisors (A000203).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: from sympy import divisor_sigma as D
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
def a(n): return T(D(n), D(2*n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 12 2017
xref: Cf. A000203, A002131, A054785 (sequences matching to this filter), also A161942, A286357.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 10 2017
